title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1503 - Sprinkler Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1503 - Sprinkler Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings

State Regulations
§ 1503.1 - General requirements
§ 1503.2 - Existing installations
§ 1503.3 - Water supply
§ 1503.4 - Piping systems
§ 1503.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads
§ 1503.6 - Fire department connection
§ 1503.7 - Sprinkler alarm
§ 1503.8 - House service water supply
§ 1503.9 - Maintenance
§ 1503.10 - Standard for compliance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1503

Statutory authority: Multiple Residence Law, §326

The provisions of this Part apply to complete sprinkler
systems installed throughout hotels and similar dwellings. The requirements for
sprinkler systems consisting only of sprinkler heads and piping installed in
special locations in multiple dwellings are covered in Part
1504

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
